title: Chat App
description: An application that allows users to login and chat with other users. Has multiple functionalities, including adding friends, uploading images, and uploading files.

title: Aletheia
description: This is an app that scans documents with OpenAI APIs and explains them in simple terms based on the patient's history.

title: 4-Year College Planner
description: This website uses a drag and drop system and web scraping to make a 4 year for college courses at UCSC.
